title: Hong Kong bids farewell to extradition bill protester ‘Raincoat Man’
contents:
發佈日期：2019年7月12日

A final memorial was held in Quarry Bay in Hong Kong on July 11, 2019, for an anti-extradition bill protester known as “Raincoat Man”.

Mourners laid sunflowers and sang hymns to remember Marco Leung Ling-kit, the man who fell to his death on June 15 after climbing onto scaffolding in order to demonstrate against the contentious measure.

https://youtu.be/4sN8tgOmsOo
